reviewText: Hard to get Sci Fi madness. All Format  DVD Players are easy to find.  And you cannot collect such amazing classics as this without them. Get two. They are small. Well, not any smaller than your regular DVD player. But you know what I mean! Get the machine!  Tacky little movies like this one must be seen! What a great way to beat that Summer heat, or those frigid February nights!  Collect 'em all, kids!
